data.name: King Arthur's Gold: Fantasy Heads Pack
data.detailed_description:
Bring a high fantasy flavour to King Arthur's Gold! Enjoy playing as your favourite fantasy races and help support continued development!

This theme was voted as a favourite out of four by the community, and we're excited to bring you the second DLC for KAG to Steam. These high quality, unique heads will help you stand out from the crowd.



Full list of included heads:
  • Hobbit
  • Gnome
  • Dwarf Soldier
  • Dwarf Miner
  • Forest Elf
  • Dark Wraith
  • Wizard/Witch (Light and Dark versions)
  • High Elf
  • Ranger
  • Paladin
  • Heavy Knight
  • Squire
  • Goblin
  • Orc
  • Cyclops Troll
  • Imp
All heads are included for male and female genders.

data.short_description: Bring a high fantasy flavour to King Arthur's Gold! As voted by the community, these exclusive heads help you become a dwarf, elf, goblin, ranger, wizard, witch, hobbit, dark wraith, and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Dedicated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
